api/index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator
api/index.html.summary: JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator This is the documentation for JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator.

index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator
index.html.summary: JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator: JeremyAnsel.IO.DiscLocator: JeremyAnsel.IO.Locator is a .Net library to abstract file access to file system, compressed archives and disc images. The supported formats by FileLocatorFactory are: file system, Zip, Rar, Tar, 7Zip, GZip. The supported formats by DiscLocatorFactory are: Iso, Udf.
